INVITATION: Data Centres – Optimising existing estates in a world of diminishing returns
Following a presentation AECOM gave at DatacentreDynamics, London, we will be holding a panel session and breakfast on Thursday 29 January to discuss the issues surrounding the aging European datacentre estate, and the opportunities they provide for savings, expansion and improved reliability.
We hope it will be an interactive session with industry experts from various organisations providing their views and opinions.
Timings:
08.00 Registration and breakfast 08.30–09.30 Debate
Confirmed speakers:
Steve Wallage, Managing Director, BroadGroup Consulting (Chair) Luke Kubicki, Data Centres Lead EMEA, AECOM Mike Starbuck, Director, URS
If you are interested in attending, please RSVP to the address below and we will look forward to welcoming you.
To read AECOM's view of the challenges businesses are facing, please download our white paper
On: Thursday 29 January 2015, 08.00-09.30
At: AECOM, MidCity Place, 71 High Holborn, London WC1V 6QS
RSVP E: seefurther.emea@aecom.com
